div.p: This research was supported by a National Science Foundation Ecology of Infectious Disease Grant awarded to V. O. Ezenwa and A. E. Jolles (DEB‐1102493/EF‐0723928 and EF‐0723918). We also acknowledge the essential contributions in animal handling and data collection by field technician Johannie Spaan; veterinarians Brianna Beechler, Peter Buss, and Kristie Thompson; and veterinary technicians Jenny Joubert and Khosi Maseko. We would also like to acknowledge Dr. Sam Ferreira for assisting with the registration and support of this project. Publication of this paper was supported in part by Oregon State University's Thomas G. Scott Publication Fund.
